*[[XAttack#Shops|Shops]] *[[XAttack#Dungeons|Dungeons]] }} == Description == The '''XAttack''' is a type of battle item. It temporarily boosts the player's Pokémon's Attack by 50% for 30 seconds. == Details == The XAttack provides a +50% Bonus to total Pokémon Attack. == Acquisition == ===Shops===
